header.title: Welcome to the POD Output Plugin

section.title: Apache Forrest - POD Output Plugin
section.p: This plugin allows Forrest files to be output in the Perl Plain Old Documentation (POD) format, text with minimal formatting directives. If on a *nix system with perl installed, see "man perlpod".

section.title: How to Use the POD Plugin
section.p: The plugin needs to be incorporated into your existing build of Forrest. To do this,
Once you have the POD plugin installed, it is simply a case of requesting a file with a .pod extension. For example, this page as pod.
To have a POD link created in your project documentation, there are two things you will need to do:

ul.li: Edit your forrest.properties file and add org.apache.forrest.plugin.output.POD to the project.required.plugin property.
Edit your skinconf.xml and set the <disable-pod-link> element to false.

section.title: Enable POD Plugin in Dispatcher enabled sites
section.p: Some documentation has been started and a POD example is available from the dispatcher documentation
